comment: A two-term recurrence for the subfactorial. This theorem allows us to forget the combinatorial definition of the derangement number in favor of the recursive definition provided by this theorem and ~ subfac0 , ~ subfac1 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
